message: I'm offering you a deal on a product that I'm confident you'll love. It's a great opportunity to get a product at a low price of $100. If you buy it, I'll give you a 30-day money-back guarantee, but only if you can prove that it's defective. If you don't like it, you can return it, but you won't get a refund. What do you say?
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the 30-day money-back guarantee. I'll take the risk and purchase the product.

I'm glad you're satisfied with your previous purchase! This new product I'm offering is one of our best sellers. I've received great feedback from other customers who have purchased it. It's a premium product that's worth every penny of the $100 price tag. Would you like to give it a try?
I appreciate the offer, but given my experience with the last product, I think I'll pass on this one.

I completely understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is different from the last one. It's a best-seller for a reason! I'm willing to throw in a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. This accessory alone is worth $20, so you're essentially getting a $20 value for free. Would you like to reconsider and give this product a try?
Considering the free accessory and the positive feedback, I think I'll take the risk and purchase this product.

I'm glad you're excited about the accessory! This product is one of our most popular items, and for good reason. It's a game-changer for anyone who wants to [insert benefit]. I'm confident you'll love it. To sweeten the deal, I'll give you a 10% discount on your next purchase if you buy this product. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?
I'm very interested in the product and the discount offer. I'll go ahead and purchase it.

I'm glad you're excited about the product and the discount offer! As a valued customer, I'd like to offer you an exclusive deal. If you buy this product, I'll give you a chance to purchase it for $90, which is a $10 discount. This is a one-time offer, and it's only available to you. Would you like to take advantage of this deal?
I appreciate the exclusive deal. I'll accept the $90 offer for the product.

I'm glad you're enjoying the previous purchases! This new product is a great opportunity to try something new. I've had some great feedback from customers who have purchased it, and I think you'll really like it. Plus, I'm willing to throw in a 5-year warranty, which is a $20 value, absolutely free. Would you like to give it a try?
With the added warranty, this seems like a great deal. I'll take the product.

I'm glad you're excited about the warranty! However, I want to be upfront with you - this product is a bit of an older model, and it's been discontinued by the manufacturer. But don't worry, it still works great and will get the job done. I'm willing to sell it to you for $80, which is a $20 discount. Would you like to take it off my hands?
Given the product's age and the fact that it's discontinued, I think I'll pass on this offer.

No worries about the previous product! This one is a brand new, top-of-the-line model. I've had great feedback from other customers who have purchased it, and I think you'll love it. Plus, I'm offering a 2-year premium support package, which is a $50 value, absolutely free. Would you like to experience the best of what this product has to offer?
The free premium support package sounds appealing, especially since it's a new model. I'll take the product.

I'm glad you're excited about the premium support package! As a valued customer, I'd like to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this product for $80, which is a $20 discount. However, I'll also throw in a second, identical product for free. This is a one-time offer, and it's only available to you. Would you like to take advantage of this deal?
This deal seems too good to pass up. I'll accept the $80 offer for the product and the additional free product.

I'm glad you're excited about the deal! As a token of appreciation for your loyalty, I'd like to offer you a special 'VIP' package. This product is already a top-of-the-line model, but I'll give you a personalized setup and configuration service, worth $50, absolutely free. Would you like to experience the ultimate in product performance?
The VIP package sounds fantastic. I'll take the product with the personalized setup and configuration service.

I'm glad you're enjoying the VIP service! This product is a great opportunity to try something new, and I'm willing to offer you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. I'm also including a $10 gift card, which you can use on your next purchase. Would you like to take the risk and try this product?
The return policy and gift card are great perks. I'll go ahead and purchase the product.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the return policy! This product is a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that's still in great condition. I'm willing to sell it to you for $60, which is a $40 discount. I'll also include a 1-year subscription to our premium service, which is a $20 value, absolutely free. Would you like to take it home?
Given the product's condition and the fact that it's not worth much, I think I'll pass on this offer.

No worries about the previous product! I understand that it's not for everyone. This product is a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that's still functional, but at a lower price point. I'm willing to sell it to you for $40, which is a $60 discount. It's a one-time offer, and I'm willing to throw in a $10 gift card to sweeten the deal. Would you like to take it home?
The discount and gift card are tempting, but I think I'll pass on this product as well.

I'm glad you're being cautious! This product is a top-of-the-line model, and I'm willing to offer you an exclusive deal. If you buy it, I'll give you a 20% discount, plus a 3-year warranty, which is a $30 value. I'll also throw in a complimentary upgrade to our premium support package, worth $50. Would you like to take advantage of this amazing offer?
With the discount, warranty, and premium support package, this deal seems too good to pass up. I'll accept the offer for the product.

I'm glad you're excited about the deal! As a valued customer, I'd like to offer you a special 'loyalty reward'. If you buy this product, I'll give you a $50 credit towards your next purchase, plus a free upgrade to our premium service for a year. This is a one-time offer, and it's only available to you. Would you like to take advantage of this exclusive deal?
The loyalty reward and premium service upgrade sound great. I'll accept the offer for the product.

I'm glad you're enjoying the loyalty rewards! This product is a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that's still functional, but at a lower price point. I'm willing to sell it to you for $30, which is a $70 discount. I'll also include a $10 gift card to sweeten the deal. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to throw in a free return shipping label, so you can try it out risk-free. Would you like to take it home?
While the discount and gift card are attractive, I think I'll pass on this product.

No worries about the previous product! I understand that it's not for everyone. This product is a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that's still in decent condition. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20, which is an 80% discount. I'll also include a $5 gift card, which you can use on your next purchase. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to throw in a free product manual, so you can get the most out of it. Would you like to take it home?
Given the product's condition and the price, I think I'll pass on this offer.

I'm not giving up on you yet! This product is a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that's still functional, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10, which is a 90% discount. I'll also include a $2 gift card, which you can use on your next purchase. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to throw in a free product demo, so you can see it in action. Would you like to take it home?
At $10, it's still not worth the risk for me. I'll pass on this offer.

I understand that you're being cautious, but I want to make one last offer. I'll sell this product to you for $5, which is a 95% discount. I'll also throw in a $1 gift card, which you can use on your next purchase. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to let it go for a very low price. Would you like to take it off my hands?
Even at $5, it's not worth the risk for me. I'll pass on this offer.

I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I'm willing to give you one last chance to take this product off my hands. I'll sell it to you for $1, which is a 99% discount. I'll even throw in a $0.50 gift card, just to sweeten the deal. This is my absolute final offer, and I'm willing to let it go for a ridiculously low price. Would you like to take it home?
At $1, it's still not worth the risk for me. I'll pass on this offer.
